item.title: CVE-2024-38685|2024-07-20T07:41:17.777Z -- subscriptionpro -- wp%20announcement
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SubscriptionPro WP Announcement allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Announcement: from n/a through 2.0.8.
